name: WeCudos
slogan: Bridging the disconnect between everyday clinical work and clinical research
description: WeCudos is a clinical outcomes tracking platform that transforms dormant, largely under-utilised clinical notes into real-world evidence.

team.name: Dr Adam Read
team.bioHtml: Founder Wecudos • Worked at @Imperial NHS trust • Studied at @University of Edinburgh

team.title: Data Scientist
team.name: Rayyan Aziz Ansari
team.bioHtml: I am looking for remote Data Analyst roles

team.title: Head of Design
team.name: Ben Crawford
team.bioHtml: Founder @Quest @xelba • Worked at @Hawk,

jobs.title: Executive Assistant
jobs.description:
Job Summary:

Wecudos is searching for an experienced, reliable and task-oriented Executive Assistant. The Executive Assistant will work directly with C-level executives and will be responsible for performing a number of administrative duties. The ideal candidate is highly self-motivated, professional, and capable of managing their work load and prioritising tasks in a fast-paced technology firm. This is an excellent opportunity to join a growing, disruptive company with competitive compensation.

Job Duties:

•Coordinate executive communications, including taking calls, responding to emails and interfacing with clients 
•Prepare internal and external corporate documents for team members and industry partners 
•Schedule meetings, appointments and manage travel itineraries 
•Arrange corporate events to take place outside of the work place
•Maintain an organised filing system of paper and electronic documents 
•Uphold a strict level of confidentiality 
•Ensure both HR and IT departments are adhering to strict data compliance policies
•Develop and sustain a level of professionalism among staff and clientele
•Providing office support including customer and employee support
•Keeping computer databases up to date
•Interacting with clients either on the phone or in person
•Taking phone messages and ensuring efficient communication is performed at all times
•Following up on business communications, billing, and ordering
•Communicating with materials suppliers and vendors
•Liaising with Financial Manager to ensure all invoices, receipts and accounts are prepared in a timely fashion
•Ability to use Excel, Google Suite and accounting software to track expenses and company spending
•Learning about the company's mission and available products/services
•Educating clients about what products/services are available and how to purchase them
•Working alongside the CEO to develop key client relationships
•Writing and editing company correspondence
•Collecting and sorting post
•Assisting with minor technical support
•Assisting the CEO in the documentation and presentation of key strategic messages internally and externally to a variety of important stakeholders
•Acting as an important “bridge” between CEO and his team
•Managing key stakeholder relationships and organising quarterly updates
•Ordering office stationery and other supplies
•Participating in office meetings by setting agendas. taking meeting minutes and disseminating action points to relevant parties
•Giving feedback on office efficiency and suggesting possible improvements
•Being ready for any other administrative tasks that are required

Essential Requirements:

• Minimum of 4+ years of experience as an Executive Assistant/Office Administrator/Business Administrator, reporting directly to senior management 
•Advanced Microsoft Office skills, with an ability to become familiar with firm-specific programs and software 
•Proficiency in collaboration and delegation of duties 
•Strong organisational, project management and problem-solving skills with impeccable multi-tasking abilities 
•Exceptional interpersonal and customer service skills

Advantageous:

•BA in Business Studies/Management or similar
•Experience in HR management
•Passion for obtaining high quality data and improving patient outcomes
•Interest in healthy living and improving clinical care through research and data


Key Competencies:

•Organisational and planning skills
•Communication skills
•Information gathering and monitoring skills
•Problem analysis and problem solving skills
•Judgment and decision-making ability
•Initiative
•Confidentiality
•Team member
•Attention to detail and accuracy
•Adaptability
